title: Status Effects
content: Animals Gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts. Spirit Guardians Enemies within range have their Movement Speed halved on a failed Wisdom Saving Throw. Spiteful Suffering Target takes 1d4+3 Necrotic damage each turn and Attack Rolls against it have Advantage. Thaumaturgy Has advantage on Intimidation and Performance checks. True Strike The spellcaster has Advantage on Attack Rolls against this creature. Tasha's Hideous Laughter Inflict a creature with fits of laughte
